vibe_prompt.description: Powerful AI coding and debugging agent

search_golden_fund.description: Search the Golden Fund (semantic, keyword, graph, hybrid, or recursive)

ingest_dataset.description: Ingest a dataset from a URL (web_page, api, etc.)

probe_entity.description: Probe the knowledge graph for an entity to explore relationships. Returns matches, related entities, and deeper exploration results.

analyze_and_store.description: Analyze a data file (CSV/Excel/JSON) and store insights in Golden Fund. Bridges data-analysis with knowledge persistence.

get_dataset_insights.description: Retrieve stored insights for a dataset from Golden Fund.

add_knowledge_node.description: Manually add a confirmed knowledge node

c7_search.description: Search for libraries by name. Returns matching library IDs for use with c7_query.

c7_query.description: Fetches documentation for a library. Requires a Context7-compatible project identifier (e.g., /org/project).

c7_info.description: Get Context7 server info and status.

vibe_analyze_error.description: SELF-HEALING: Analyze an error and optionally implement a fix. Supports diagnostic mode (auto_fix=False).

vibe_implement_feature.description: DEEP CODING: Plan and implement complex features across multiple files

vibe_code_review.description: Perform a deep technical code review of specified files

vibe_smart_plan.description: Generate a detailed multi-step execution plan for a complex task

vibe_ask.description: Ask a technical or architectural question without making changes

vibe_execute_subcommand.description: Execute a raw Vibe CLI subcommand (e.g., list-editors)

vibe_list_sessions.description: List all active and historical Vibe sessions

vibe_which.description: Check if Vibe CLI is installed and find its path

vibe_check_db.description: Execute a read-only SQL query against the AtlasTrinity configured SQL database (SQLite by default) for deep inspection

vibe_get_system_context.description: Retrieve current operational context (Session ID, latest tasks, last errors) for focused analysis

macos-use_run_applescript.description: Ultimate AppleScript tool with AI generation, templates, debugging, and validation.

macos-use_open_app.description: Opens the application with the specified bundle identifier or name.

macos-use_click_and_traverse.description: Simulates a click and traverses the accessibility tree.

macos-use_type_and_traverse.description: Simulates typing text and traverses the accessibility tree.

macos-use_refresh_traversal.description: Traverses the accessibility tree of the specified PID or frontmost app.

macos-use_take_screenshot.description: Enhanced screenshot tool with region, monitor, and OCR support.

macos-use_analyze_screen.description: Enhanced OCR and UI analysis tool.

macos-use_press_key_and_traverse.description: Simulates pressing a key with modifiers and traverses the tree.

macos-use_drag_and_drop_and_traverse.description: Simulates a drag and drop action.

macos-use_window_management.description: Manage windows: move, resize, minimize, maximize, etc.

macos-use_set_clipboard.description: Set clipboard content with rich text and history support.

macos-use_system_control.description: Control system parameters like volume and brightness.

macos-use_fetch_url.description: Fetch URL content and parse HTML to text.

macos-use_get_time.description: Retrieve current time or convert timezones.

macos-use_notes_create_note.description: Create a note in Apple Notes.

macos-use_notes_get_content.description: Get content of an Apple Note.

macos-use_mail_send.description: Send an email via Apple Mail.

macos-use_finder_move_to_trash.description: Move an item to Trash via Finder.

create_entities.description: Batch create or update entities in knowledge graph

search.description: Semantic search in knowledge graph (returns closest entities)

create_relation.description: Link two entities in the knowledge graph with a specific relationship

ingest_verified_dataset.description: HIGH-PRECISION INGESTION: Validates, creates structured table, indexes in KG, and discovers semantic links.

query_db.description: Execute a raw SQL query against the system database (READ-ONLY). Used for technical audits.

get_db_schema.description: Retrieve the database schema (tables and columns) for technical audits.

batch_add_nodes.description: Optimized batch insertion of multiple nodes into the Knowledge Graph.

bulk_ingest_table.description: Ingest a large table (CSV/JSON/XLSX) into the Knowledge Graph as a DATASET node.

trace_data_chain.description: RECURSIVE SEMANTIC CHAINING: Follows LINKED_TO edges to reconstruct a unified record across datasets.

generate_mermaid.description: Generate a Mermaid.js flowchart of the graph (optional filter by node type)

get_node_details.description: Retrieve full attributes and metadata for a specific graph node

get_related_nodes.description: Find all nodes connected to a specific ID in the graph

search_files.description: Search files by name or content

puppeteer_screenshot.description: Take a screenshot of the current page or a specific element.

take_screenshot.description: Capture the screenshot of the current page.

sequentialthinking.description: Perform step-by-step reasoning for complex tasks.

create_or_update_file.description: Create or update a single file in a GitHub repository.

list_pull_requests.description: List pull requests in a repository.

duckduckgo_search.description: Perform a web search using DuckDuckGo HTML interface

business_registry_search.description: SPECIALIZED: Search Ukrainian business registries (YouControl, Opendatabot) for company data (ЄДРПОУ, address, etc.)

open_data_search.description: SPECIALIZED: Search Ukrainian Open Data Portal (data.gov.ua) for datasets (.csv, .xlsx, .json)

structured_data_search.description: SPECIALIZED: Search for structured data sources (CSV, XLSX, JSON) on data.gov.ua

github_whoami.description: Returns the authenticated GitHub user (requires GITHUB_TOKEN)

get_file_contents.description: Fetch file contents from GitHub and return decoded text.

create_branch.description: Create a new branch in a repository.

transcribe_audio.description: Transcribe an audio file to text. Uses Brain server if available to save VRAM.

record_and_transcribe.description: Record audio from microphone and transcribe it.

restart_application.description: Restart the entire AtlasTrinity application (Graceful Shutdown + ExecV)

restart_mcp_server.description: Restart a specific MCP server instance

redis_get.description: Get the value of a key from Redis.

redis_set.description: Set the value of a key in Redis with optional expiry.

redis_keys.description: Find all keys matching the given pattern.

redis_info.description: Get Redis server stats and memory info.

redis_ttl.description: Get time-to-live (TTL) for a key in seconds.

redis_hgetall.description: Get all fields and values in a Redis hash.

redis_hset.description: Set multiple fields in a Redis hash.

vibe_get_config.description: Get the current Vibe configuration state (active model, mode, providers)

vibe_configure_model.description: Switch the active model for Vibe operations

vibe_set_mode.description: Change operational mode (default, plan, accept-edits, auto-approve)

vibe_configure_provider.description: Add or update a provider configuration at runtime

vibe_session_details.description: Get detailed history and metrics for a specific Vibe session

vibe_reload_config.description: Reload the Vibe configuration from disk

vibe_test_in_sandbox.description: Execute a test script in an isolated temporary sandbox with mock files

devtools_list_processes.description: List all processes tracked by the AtlasTrinity Watchdog (PID, type, CPU usage, health).

devtools_restart_mcp_server.description: Gracefully restart a specific MCP server.

devtools_kill_process.description: Forcefully terminate or kill a specific process by PID.

devtools_check_mcp_health.description: Run the system-wide MCP health check script. Ping all enabled servers and report their status.

devtools_get_system_map.description: Get the complete AtlasTrinity system map: all paths, MCP servers, databases, logs, tools.

devtools_test_all_mcp_native.description: Test ALL enabled MCP servers natively by spawning each server process and listing tools via stdio JSON-RPC.

devtools_launch_inspector.description: Launch the official MCP Inspector for a specific server (Tier 1-4). Returns localhost URL.

devtools_validate_config.description: Validate the syntax and basic structure of the local MCP configuration file.

devtools_lint_python.description: Run the 'ruff' linter on a specific file or directory. Returns structured JSON results.

devtools_run_global_lint.description: Run the complete system linting suite (npm run lint:all). 13 parallel checks: JS/TS (biome, oxlint, tsc, eslint), Python (ruff, pyright, pyrefly, xenon, bandit, vulture), Cross (knip, security, yaml-sync).

devtools_lint_js.description: Run JS/TS linters (oxlint and eslint) on a specific file or directory. Returns structured results from both tools.

devtools_find_dead_code.description: Run 'knip' (JS/TS) and 'vulture' (Python) to find unused code, files, dependencies, exports, variables, and functions.

devtools_check_integrity.description: Run 'pyrefly' to check code integrity and find generic coding errors.

read_metadata.description: Extract comprehensive metadata from a data file (CSV, Excel, JSON, Parquet) including columns, types, statistics, and data quality info

analyze_dataset.description: Analyze a dataset with statistical methods (summary, correlation, distribution, outliers) and generate insights

generate_statistics.description: Generate statistical analysis (mean, median, std dev, etc.) from a dataset

create_visualization.description: Create visualizations (charts, graphs, plots) from data

data_aggregation.description: Aggregate and summarize data by grouping and applying functions (sum, mean, count, min, max, std)

interpret_column_data.description: Interpret specific columns to understand their value patterns with counts and distributions

run_pandas_code.description: Execute pandas code safely in a sandboxed environment. Data is loaded as 'df' variable if data_source provided.

postgres_query.description: Execute a read-only SQL query against the central PostgreSQL database.

postgres_list_tables.description: List all tables in the specified PostgreSQL schema (default: 'public').

postgres_describe_table.description: Get schema information (columns, types) for a specific PostgreSQL table.

postgres_execute.description: Execute write queries (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE) against the PostgreSQL database.

postgres_schema_alter.description: Execute schema modifications (ALTER TABLE, CREATE INDEX) on PostgreSQL.

postgres_health_check.description: Check PostgreSQL server health, connectivity, and performance metrics.

devtools_update_architecture_diagrams.description: Universal architecture diagram generator for ANY project type (Python, Node.js, Rust, Go, etc.). Analyzes project structure, initializes git if needed, configures GitHub remote, and generates/updates diagrams dynamically. target_mode: 'internal' (AtlasTrinity) or 'external' (other projects).

build_sim.description: Build for iOS simulator using defaults.

boot_sim.description: Boot the iOS simulator selected as default.

install_app_sim.description: Install an app bundle on the simulator.

launch_app_sim.description: Launch the default app on the simulator.

discover_projs.description: Find Xcode project and workspace files.

xcodebuild_get_coverage.description: Get code coverage report from last test run.

react_get_introspection_script.description: Returns a JavaScript snippet for React introspection to be executed in the browser context.

devtools_check_security.description: Run security audit tools (bandit, safety, detect-secrets, npm audit).

devtools_check_types_python.description: Run deep type checking for Python (mypy).

devtools_check_types_ts.description: Run deep type checking for TypeScript (tsc --noEmit).

mcp_inspector_list_tools.description: List all tools available on a specified MCP server via Inspector CLI.

mcp_inspector_call_tool.description: Call a specific tool on an MCP server via Inspector CLI with JSON arguments.

mcp_inspector_list_resources.description: List all resources available on a specified MCP server via Inspector CLI.

mcp_inspector_read_resource.description: Read a specific resource from an MCP server by URI via Inspector CLI.

mcp_inspector_list_prompts.description: List all prompts available on a specified MCP server via Inspector CLI.

mcp_inspector_get_prompt.description: Get a specific prompt from an MCP server with optional arguments via Inspector CLI.

mcp_inspector_get_schema.description: Get the JSON input schema for a specific tool on an MCP server.

devtools_run_mcp_sandbox.description: Run MCP sandbox tests with LLM-generated scenarios. Tests ALL tools (including destructive) in safe isolation.

devtools_run_context_check.description: Run logic validation tests from a YAML/JSON file against expectations.

devtools_analyze_trace.description: Analyze MCP execution logs for loops, hallucinations, and inefficiencies.

maps_search_places.description: Search for places with advanced filtering (types, price, open status)

maps_place_details.description: Get detailed info including reviews, hours, and photos

maps_directions.description: Get directions with multi-stop, alternatives, and live traffic

maps_distance_matrix.description: Calculate distance and time with live traffic

maps_street_view.description: Get Street View image with optional Cyberpunk styling

maps_static_map.description: Generate static map image with optional Cyberpunk styling

maps_start_tour.description: Start a guided virtual tour along a route (encoded polyline)

maps_tour_control.description: Control active tour: stop, pause, resume, look (heading)

tour_start.description: Start a virtual tour along an encoded polyline

tour_look.description: Change the agent's relative view angle (-90 for left, 90 for right)

tour_set_speed.description: Adjust the tour movement speed (0.5 to 3.0)
